thread.title: Sichuan Troy Information Tech gets regulatory approval for asset acquisition
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Sichuan Troy Information Tech gets regulatory approval for asset acquisition | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Sichuan Troy Information Tech gets regulatory approval for asset acquisition
text:
Sept 24 Sichuan Troy Information Technology Co Ltd
* Says gets securities regulator's approval for asset acquisition, shares to resume trading on Sept 25
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1KDkrrc
 (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms)
